examples: The road bends to the left after the traffic lights.

definitions.definition: to move your body or part of your body so that it is not straight:
examples: I bent down and picked up the coins lying on the road.

definitions.definition: in a position in which the knee of one leg is touching the floor:
examples: He went down on bended knee to ask her to marry him.
There's a bend in the pipe so you can't see from one end to the other.

definitions.definition: in football, the curve in which a ball moves when it has been kicked in a particular way:
examples: Good players can put bend on the ball.
